song.englishname: Never Gonna Be As BigAs Jesus

english.segment1: I could move to Hollywood. get my teeth capped I know I could. be a big star on the silver screen. just like James Dean I could be a star. I could climb the corporate ladder. buy, sell, and liquidate. Maybe be just like the Beatles. melodic, rocking heavyweights. I could learn to sing and dance. if I only had a chance. I could be a big rock star
english.segment2: I could be anything I wanted to. I wanted to. I could be anything but one thing's true
english.segment3: Never gonna be as big as Jesus. never gonna hold the world in my hand. never gonna be as big as Jesus. never gonna build a promised land. but that's alright with me
english.segment4: I could build a tower to heaven. get on top and touch the sky. I could write a million songs. all designed to glorify. I could be about as good. good as any human could. but that won't get me by.
